meta.title: Finding a Key
meta.description: How to find a specific key in the Database

body:
Finding only One

  • The Async/Await method
const result = await database.findOne({ where: { key: "test" } });
console.log(result);

  • The .then method
database
    .findOne({ key: "test" })
    .then((result) => console.log(result))
    .catch(console.error);

info

Many Parameters can be specified in where options.
